sampleCxml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE cXML SYSTEM "http://xml.cxml.org/schemas/cXML/1.2.014/cXML.dtd">
<cXML payloadID="123456789" timestamp="2024-01-15T10:30:00Z">
  <Header>
    <From>
      <Credential domain="NetworkID">
        <Identity>ACME_NETWORK</Identity>
      </Credential>
    </From>
    <To>
      <Credential domain="DUNS">
        <Identity>123456789</Identity>
      </Credential>
    </To>
    <Sender>
      <Credential domain="NetworkID">
        <Identity>ACME_SENDER</Identity>
        <SharedSecret>acme_secret_123</SharedSecret>
      </Credential>
    </Sender>
  </Header>
  <Request>
    <PunchOutSetupRequest operation="create">
      <BuyerCookie>ACME_COOKIE_123</BuyerCookie>
      <BrowserFormPost>
        <URL>https://acme.com/punchout/return</URL>
      </BrowserFormPost>
    </PunchOutSetupRequest>
  </Request>
</cXML>
notes: ACME Corporation development environment onboarding. Custom cXML format with specific network identifiers.

sampleCxml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE cXML SYSTEM "http://xml.cxml.org/schemas/cXML/1.2.014/cXML.dtd">
<cXML payloadID="987654321" timestamp="2024-02-01T09:00:00Z">
  <Header>
    <From>
      <Credential domain="DUNS">
        <Identity>987654321</Identity>
      </Credential>
    </From>
    <To>
      <Credential domain="NetworkID">
        <Identity>WATERS_CATALOG</Identity>
      </Credential>
    </To>
  </Header>
  <Request>
    <PunchOutSetupRequest operation="create">
      <BuyerCookie>GLOBAL_SESSION_XYZ</BuyerCookie>
      <Extrinsic name="UniqueName">john.doe@globalmanuf.com</Extrinsic>
      <Extrinsic name="UserEmail">john.doe@globalmanuf.com</Extrinsic>
      <BrowserFormPost>
        <URL>https://coupa.globalmanuf.com/punchout/return</URL>
      </BrowserFormPost>
    </PunchOutSetupRequest>
  </Request>
</cXML>
notes: Coupa integration for Global Manufacturing Inc. Production environment with enhanced user tracking.

sampleCxml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE cXML SYSTEM "http://xml.cxml.org/schemas/cXML/1.2.014/cXML.dtd">
<cXML payloadID="ariba_001" timestamp="2024-03-01T11:15:00Z">
  <Header>
    <From>
      <Credential domain="NetworkId">
        <Identity>AN01000000001</Identity>
      </Credential>
    </From>
    <To>
      <Credential domain="DUNS">
        <Identity>111222333</Identity>
      </Credential>
    </To>
    <Sender>
      <Credential domain="AribaNetworkUserId">
        <Identity>techcorp_user</Identity>
        <SharedSecret>ariba_shared_secret</SharedSecret>
      </Credential>
    </Sender>
  </Header>
  <Request>
    <PunchOutSetupRequest operation="create">
      <BuyerCookie>ARIBA_TECHCORP_SESSION</BuyerCookie>
      <Extrinsic name="CompanyCode">TC001</Extrinsic>
      <BrowserFormPost>
        <URL>https://service.ariba.com/Buyer/Main/ad/punchoutReturn</URL>
      </BrowserFormPost>
    </PunchOutSetupRequest>
  </Request>
</cXML>
notes: SAP Ariba integration for TechCorp Solutions. Staging environment for UAT testing.

sampleCxml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE cXML SYSTEM "http://xml.cxml.org/schemas/cXML/1.2.014/cXML.dtd">
<cXML payloadID="oracle_dev_001" timestamp="2024-02-15T13:45:00Z">
  <Header>
    <From>
      <Credential domain="DUNS">
        <Identity>555666777</Identity>
      </Credential>
    </From>
    <To>
      <Credential domain="NetworkID">
        <Identity>WATERS_SUPPLIER</Identity>
      </Credential>
    </To>
  </Header>
  <Request>
    <PunchOutSetupRequest operation="create">
      <BuyerCookie>PHARMA_DEV_SESSION</BuyerCookie>
      <Extrinsic name="User">pharma.buyer@pharmaco.com</Extrinsic>
      <Extrinsic name="SoldTo">PC_USA_001</Extrinsic>
      <BrowserFormPost>
        <URL>https://dev-procurement.pharmaco.com/punchout/return</URL>
      </BrowserFormPost>
    </PunchOutSetupRequest>
  </Request>
</cXML>
notes: Oracle iProcurement integration for PharmaCo. Development environment for initial testing.
